content.question: If <math alttext="y equals, negative 3 times the cosine of, open parenthesis, 2 x, close parenthesis" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>y</mi><mo>=</mo><mrow><mo>−</mo><mn>3</mn></mrow><mi>cos</mi><mo>⁡</mo><mrow><mo>(</mo><mn>2</mn><mi>x</mi><mo>)</mo></mrow></mrow></mstyle></math>, then <math alttext="the second derivative of y with respect to x, equals" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mfrac><mrow><msup><mrow><mo>ⅆ</mo></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msup><mi>y</mi></mrow><mrow><mo>ⅆ</mo><msup><mrow><mi>x</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msup></mrow></mfrac><mo>=</mo></mrow></mstyle></math>

choices.label: <math alttext="negative 12 times the cosine of, open parenthesis, 2 x, close parenthesis" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mo>−</mo><mn>12</mn><mi>cos</mi><mo>⁡</mo><mrow><mo>(</mo><mn>2</mn><mi>x</mi><mo>)</mo></mrow></mrow></mstyle></math>

<math alttext="12 times the cosine of, open parenthesis, 2 x, close parenthesis" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mn>12</mn><mi>cos</mi><mo>⁡</mo><mrow><mo>(</mo><mn>2</mn><mi>x</mi><mo>)</mo></mrow></mrow></mstyle></math>

<math alttext="negative 3 times the cosine of, open parenthesis, 2 x, close parenthesis" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mrow><mo>−</mo><mn>3</mn></mrow><mi>cos</mi><mo>⁡</mo><mrow><mo>(</mo><mn>2</mn><mi>x</mi><mo>)</mo></mrow></mrow></mstyle></math>

<math alttext="3 times the cosine of, open parenthesis, 2 x, close parenthesis" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mn>3</mn><mi>cos</mi><mo>⁡</mo><mrow><mo>(</mo><mn>2</mn><mi>x</mi><mo>)</mo></mrow></mrow></mstyle></math>
